welcome_message_body: Welcome to Temperley, Argentina! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Temperley has to offer!

restaurants.name: La Taberna
restaurants.description: La Taberna is a italian restaurant located in Lomas de Zamora.
restaurants.address: Cnel. Ramón Falcón 146 (e/ Av. Meeks y España), 1832 lomas de zamora, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: La Provisión
restaurants.description: La Provisión is a argentinian restaurant located in Lomas de Zamora.
restaurants.address: Balcarce 299 (e/ Las Piedras y Belgrano), B1832GVG Lomas de Zamora, Buenos Aires

restaurants.name: Tienda de Café

restaurants.name: Olika
restaurants.description: Olika is a burger joint located in Lomas de Zamora.

restaurants.name: Sensei
restaurants.description: Sensei is a japanese restaurant located in Lomas de Zamora.
restaurants.address: España 398 (esq. Bartolomé Mitre), B1832DFP Lomas de zamora, Buenos Aires

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
